title: Speculative Journeys: SciFi, fantasy and other strange tales
description: Explore the strange and endless possibilities of the future. How desperate will humans become? Where will exploration, science and politics lead us? Regardless of where you go to seek answers--a distant moon, the back streets of a dystopian society, a grave--the stories within these pages will keep you wandering.Speculative Journeys is a collection of T. M. Crone's previously published short stories.
author: T.M. Crone
